titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Michael Frederick Accessions
titlestmt.author: Mary Garcia (2011), Maggie DeBrecht (2013)

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-23 13:00:28 -0500.

change.item: Revised for ArchivesSpace by Katie Salzmann

did.head: Collection Summary
did.physloc: Materials may be stored off-site. Advance notice is required for use: https://www.thewittliffcollections.txstate.edu/research/makearesearchappointment.html.
did.abstract: Photographs of Texas musicians while in concert, taken by Michael Frederick in venues around Central Texas.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Michael Frederick is a photographer in Central Texas.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Michael Frederick Accessions, The Wittliff Collections, Texas State University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Photographs of Texas musicians while in concert, taken by Michael Frederick in venues around Central Texas.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Materials from the Wittliff Collections are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study. The user assumes responsibility for determining copyright status, obtaining permission to publish, and abiding by U.S. copyright laws. https://www.thewittliffcollections.txstate.edu/research/visit/policies/publication.html

scopecontent.head: Abstract
scopecontent.p: Both black and white and color photographs of Texas musicians while in concert, taken by Michael Frederick includes Max Stalling, Wade Bowen, Blacktop Gypsy, Emory Quinn, Roger Creager, Ray Price and others. Other materials include two set lists, one Max Stalling poster and one DVD-R with photographs taken between January 2010 and April 2011. The photographs were taken at John T. Floore's Country Store in Helotes, River Road Ice House in New Braunfels, and Cowboy Dance Hall in San Antonio, all in Texas. A few of the photographs have been signed by the musician in the photo.

did.unittitle: Six black and white 8" x 10" photographs; individually labeled by Frederick with name, date and venue for each one
Five color 8" x 10" photographs; individually labeled by Frederick with name, date and venue for each
Six 12" x 8 " black and white photographs, individually labeled by Frederick with name, date and venue for each
Twelve black and white 12" x 8"photographs, individually labeled by Frederick with name, date and venue for each
One DVD-R with photographs taken between January 2010 and April 2011; set list for Max Stalling at John T. Floore's Country Store December 30, 2010; set list for Cory Morrow Band
One 17" x 11" Max Stalling color flyer for "Dec. 30th free show" at John T. Floore's Country Store in Helotes, Texas. Condition note: small holes/tears in all four corners

Texas music ephemera, including a Roger Creager set list, Jason Boland & The Stragglers all access backstage pass, and five concert tickets: Robert Earl Keen, Joe Ely Band, Roger Creager's Birthday Show, Steve Earle and The Dukes, Jason Boland & The Stragglers.
